title: Ticket #526: Make a DAGMan/Stork test
description: We should have a DAG test that runs (at least a simulated) Stork job. Probably part of the test should include artificially creating a collision between Condor and Stork IDs to make sure we separate them correctly.
remarks:
Okay, I see there is already a DAGMan/Stork test, but I doubt that it tests the ID collision problem...

2014-Jan-27 17:39:00 by wenger:
Hmm -- I see that as of now all of the Stork tests are commented out.

2015-May-13 16:57:03 by wenger:
I'm going to mark this as abandoned, since we don't support Stork anymore...
creator: wenger
